_sText:
de_favela_day

This map is an improved version of de_favela. de_favela has some gameplay issues, first the map is too dark which makes difficult to see the enemy, second is too T sided. De_favela_day is supposed to fix these issues with a day-light lighting and some lay-out changes. Plus, it has some visual improvements.

I released this version as a new map, because I intend to keep de_favela with its sun-set / dusk lighting, and intend to release soon a version with further improvements on that map. Maybe even a night version.

All files included in the bsp, including nav.

Important note:

To play the map, after launching counter-strike source, its import NOT to run de_favela before, because many textures on both maps have the same name but were modified. So if you run de_favela the game will load the old textures and then changing to de_favela_day it will use these old textures previously loaded from de_favela. To fix this you have to exit the game and relaunch it, and run de_favela_day again. To avoid this inconvinient for good, I suggest to delete de_favela, or to move it from the maps directory. This rule goes also for other maps I released that were released before like cs_complexo2_v1 e cs_complexo2_v2 which also use textures with same name that were later modified for de_favela_day.

Thanks to Chizbone for the nav.

Thanks to all servers that played de_favela, allowing me to realize the gameplay issues and make the improvements, hope you approve this new map and keep it on your map rotation. Let me name some that I tracked:

-	|Front War|
-	HAVAIANA
-	GHOST
-	PCS Amigos das Antigas
-	TecHhpoint Lanhouse

So, its de_favela_day, tunned for top gameplay. Have fun. And I appreciate your feed-back.
